text: The Rip-Off is a 1989 crime novel by Jim Thompson. ==Plot== Britton Rainstar is deeply in love with a woman named Manuela Aloe and the longer he stays with her, the closer to death he comes. ==References== Category:1989 American novels Category:Novels by Jim Thompson Category:English-language books Category:Crime novels Category:Novels published posthumously
title: The Rip-Off (novel)
